description: Each month, we are featuring a Justia Connect member who has achieved a perfect 10 Justia Lawyer Rating!

Justia Lawyer Rating and Reviews is a system designed to allow lawyers to share valuable insight from peers and colleagues personally familiar with that lawyerâ€™s work. Lawyers who have been reviewed by their peers receive a Justia Lawyer Rating, which is a numerical representation of these peer reviews.

These lawyers also earn the Justia Lawyer Rating Badge to display on their Justia Lawyer Directory profile and other marketing materials, such as websites and blogs. Our research shows that the Justia Lawyer Rating Badge is even the most frequently used search filter in the Justia Lawyer Directory!
